Action.author: aambati
Action.body: cfssl logger uses default go's default logger which outputs to stderr by default. So, in the main.go of cmd/fabric-ca-client and cmd/fabric-ca-server, we can call log.SetOutput(os.Stdout) to make default logger to output to stdout instead. But with this change all log messages are output to stdout except for bccsp log messages.

Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: sorry I missed this earlier - we should mark this as won't fix as it seems to be industry standard to log to stderr and this what what core fabric does as well - https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/blob/master/common/flogging/logging.go#L58
